overview:
Bruce Gilbert is Founder and CEO of LifeLab Solutions Inc. His clinical work is as a Board Certified Urologist specializing in Male Fertility and he serves as an Associate Professor of Clinical Urology and Reproductive Medicine at Weill Cornell Medical College. He holds additional Board Certification as a High Complexity Laboratory Director, and is the Medical and Laboratory Director of NYCryo, his New York State Licensed and AATB accredited Reproductive Tissue Bank for over 10 years. He also is the Laboratory Director of a New York State Licensed Andrology Laboratory for 20 years, during which he developed the structure for the LifeLab Database Manager.

Bruce earned his MD degree from Cornell University Medical College and a Ph.D. in Renal Physiology from New York Medical College. His Bachelors and Masters degrees are in Electrical Engineering. He serves on the Medical Advisory Committees of several Reproductive Tissue Banks as well as committees of the American Association of Tissue Banks.
